page.title: 02Dundrennan Abbey
page.content: The Abbey is the most prominent building in our village. People from all over the world come to visit it while they are on their holidays.They have come from Germany, France,Denmark,India,America and China. There are three custodians who have to make sure people pay to look around. Every few years parts of the Abbey need repairing.People from the Church of Scotland carry out this work.The Abbey lawns are cut every week by the custodians. There is a cemetry which is still used for burials of people who have relatives buried there. This summer about 330 visitors are expected,including six school parties and one party of pensioners.
